trans-unit.source: ﻿The life of modern society cannot be imagined without advertising.
trans-unit.target: ﻿The life of modern society cannot be imagined without advertising.

trans-unit.source: Advertising is a dynamic area of rapidly changing human activity.
trans-unit.target: Advertising is a dynamic area of rapidly changing human activity.

trans-unit.source: For many centuries, being a constant companion of a person, she changes with her.
trans-unit.target: For many centuries, being a constant companion of a person, she changes with her.

trans-unit.source: The nature of advertising, its content and form undergo metamorphosis along with the development of productive forces of society, the change of socio-economic formations.
trans-unit.target: The nature of advertising, its content and form undergo metamorphosis along with the development of productive forces of society, the change of socio-economic formations.

trans-unit.source: Global factors in the advertising «dialectic» of advertising are the needs of production, trade, and finance, the form of government, the goals of various religious denominations, politicians and ordinary citizens.
trans-unit.target: Global factors in the advertising «dialectic» of advertising are the needs of production, trade, and finance, the form of government, the goals of various religious denominations, politicians and ordinary citizens.

trans-unit.source: Additionally, advertising is fairly defined as part of a universal culture that develops in its internal laws.
trans-unit.target: Additionally, advertising is fairly defined as part of a universal culture that develops in its internal laws.

trans-unit.source: Advertising has been a long and complicated way of its own evolution.
trans-unit.target: Advertising has been a long and complicated way of its own evolution.

trans-unit.source: Beginning its history in the ancient world, advertising throughout its existence met the specific needs of man in public commercial communications.
trans-unit.target: Beginning its history in the ancient world, advertising throughout its existence met the specific needs of man in public commercial communications.

trans-unit.source: At the same time, its role sometimes increased, sometimes sharply decreased.
trans-unit.target: At the same time, its role sometimes increased, sometimes sharply decreased.

trans-unit.source: This complex process was determined, first of all, by the nature of the goals of advertisers.
trans-unit.target: This complex process was determined, first of all, by the nature of the goals of advertisers.

trans-unit.source: An important factor was the availability of the choice of addresses in advertising in the field of economy, politics, personal and social life.
trans-unit.target: An important factor was the availability of the choice of addresses in advertising in the field of economy, politics, personal and social life.

trans-unit.source: The action of advertising is realized, as is known, by influencing the psychology of man.
trans-unit.target: The action of advertising is realized, as is known, by influencing the psychology of man.

trans-unit.source: As a result, she actively participates in the formation of human psychological settings, systems of his environmental assessments and self-esteem, the nature of reactions to various stimuli, the creation of a particular psychological climate, etc.
trans-unit.target: As a result, she actively participates in the formation of human psychological settings, systems of his environmental assessments and self-esteem, the nature of reactions to various stimuli, the creation of a particular psychological climate, etc.

trans-unit.source: In this regard, the allocation of the psychological role of advertising is fully justified.
trans-unit.target: In this regard, the allocation of the psychological role of advertising is fully justified.

trans-unit.source: Consequently, advertising plays both a positive and negative role in human life.
trans-unit.target: Consequently, advertising plays both a positive and negative role in human life.

trans-unit.source: In the modern world advertising is an unsurpassed kind of art.
trans-unit.target: In the modern world advertising is an unsurpassed kind of art.
